description:
About The Job:
*As part of our rapid global expansion we are looking for an Enterprise Account Executive to join our first-on-the ground team in the United States. 
*Our ambitions are high and wide: to bring to market the most advanced technology, we are  building a best-in-class Go-To-Market team: Builders wanted!
*As one of the first  Enterprise Account Executive in the US, you will be instrumental in shaping Mistral’s adoption in the large Enterprise across a variety of industries starting with Financial Services.

Responsibilities:

Pipeline Generation & Pipeline Coverage: 
*Effectively and consistently building pipeline and pipeline coverage to achieve revenue goals across various sources including Inbound and Product lead flow, account-based prospecting for strategic accounts, collaboration with our ecosystem of partners

Best-In-Class End-to-End Deal Management:
*Leading effective business and technical discovery to attach our solutions to customers’ desired business outcomes
*Developing strong champions in your accounts to progress deals, ensuring pilot success, leading your customers through production and accelerating adoption in your accounts
*Effectively gaining access & commitment from economic/executive buyers, developing and maintaining strong relationships with them (eg. C-level executives, heads of innovation/AI)Effective negotiator, aligning all stakeholders’ interests and demonstrating mutual benefit

Complex Solution Defining and Positioning:
*Effectively qualifying and influencing required capabilities to enable your customers to achieve their desired outcomes and differentiate in the marketplaceInfluencing and gaining control of evaluations
*Developing effective Business Cases to maximize win rates and capture budgets
*Demonstrating strong product, verticals and use cases knowledge and insights to develop trusted relationships with your customers across levels & functions

Company Builder & Strong Collaborator
*Deep partnership with Solution Engineering expected pre & post sales to drive customer success
*Tight collaboration with Sales Development (SDR) essential to maximize pipeline generation effectiveness and results
*Working alongside our Channel Partners and Alliances peer(s) will be an accelerant to resultsAs a member of the first GTM team on the ground in the US your customers’ and market feedback will be required to inform product roadmap decisions

About you 
*7+ years experience selling technology & software solutions to the EnterpriseStrong value based selling skills (Force Management & MEDDPICC trained preferred)
*Work experience within AI ecosystem or related data/infrastructure field importantExperience at an early & successful fast growing startup, ideally in deep-tech strongly preferredOutstanding communication skills & executive presence

We may be a match if your are :

A Builder: motivated by building an industry, Mistral and the teamPassionate about
Artificial Intelligence and the role of Open Source in accelerating Innovation: you understand the deep revolution underway and want to be part of it
Customer-obsessed: you understand that results and success come from customer centricity. You excel at understanding the customer's vision and their needs and leveraging your role and resources to achieve customer satisfaction
Results & action oriented: you measure your performance by the tangible results you achieve and default to action and impact
Driven by excellence: you are a continuous learner and seek to achieve outstanding levels of sales excellence in all aspects of the profession. You seek feedback and positively challenge others to achieve their potential

What We Offer: 
*Ability to shape the exciting journey of AI and be part of the very early days of one of the hottest startup in AI A fun, young, multicultural team and collaborative work environment
*Competitive salary and bonus structure 
*Equity
*Opportunities for professional growth and development

*Our ambitions are high and wide: to bring to market the most advanced technology, we are  building a best-in-class Go-To-Market team: Builders wanted!
*As one of the first  Mid Market Account Executive in the US, you will be instrumental in shaping Mistral’s adoption in organizations with <$1B in revenue across a variety of industries starting with digital natives.

Responsibilities:

Pipeline Generation & Pipeline Coverage: 
*Effectively and consistently building pipeline and pipeline coverage to achieve revenue goals across various sources including Inbound and Product lead flow, account-based prospecting for high value mid market accounts in your territory, collaboration with our ecosystem of partners

company_name: Mistral AI - Revenue Development Representative (US Market)
description:
About The Job
-As our first Revenue Development Representative on the ground in the US, you will work closely with our GM and the go-to-market team to build a qualified pipeline and establish the foundation for a best-in-class & efficient  funnel at Mistral.

Responsibilities

Pipeline Generation from Inbound Marketing Sources,  Product Qualified Leads and Channel leads:
-Effectively qualify incoming Marketing Qualified Leads & Product Qualified Leads leveraging strict qualification criteria leveraging multi-channel tactics (call, emails, social)
-Work closely with your Enterprise and Mid Market Account Executives to hand-off
-Qualified Sales Leads and create an exceptional customer experience
-Build, deploy and improve highly effective persona-based cadences to nurture prospects across levels and drive conversions 
-Attach prospects needs to a Mistral solution that meets their needs at a high level and ignite interest
-Confidently handle objections across all methods of communication (emails, cold calls, social) to drive conversion
-Consistently schedule qualified meetings to achieve weekly, monthly and quarterly goals using multi-channel and multi-touch prospecting cadences and tactics (emails, phone, Linkedin) 

Pipeline Generation from Outbound:
-Build effective account plans for target accounts leveraging research, understanding of key uses cases & verticals as well as signal from open source downloads in partnership with your account executives
-Identify existing and new contacts to prospect into in line with our uses cases and buyer personas

Funnel Management & Optimization:
-Consistently leverage CRM to track meetings and qualification
-Insure strong data hygiene in CRM
-Provide qualitative and quantitative feedback on Ideal Customer Profile, Personas, Use Cases and Prospect Requirements to Marketing/Product functions in order to continuously improve positioning and campaigns effectiveness
-Provide qualitative and quantitative feedback to Revenue Operations to improve funnel conversions (including Lead scoring)
-Effectively leverage technology to automate individualized nurturing

About you : 
-2+ years of Sales Development experience both managing outbound and inbound funnels to generate pipeline in complex technical environments (eg AI, Data, Enterprise Infrastructure): experience with open-source and PLG models a plus
-Driven and motivated to build a career in sales in a best-in-class environmentAs the first RDR on the ground in the US you will need to be a fast learner and autonomous
-Excellent communication skills across multiple levels including asking great qualification questions, impactful elevator pitch and introduction to solutions, ability to close for a next step. Eg. a meeting
-Strong business acumen: you can adapt your questions and how you position Mistral and its solutions based on your understanding of the prospect business and their priorities
-You know how to manage your time well and how to prioritize your activities
-Passion for AI, with a constant drive to stay updated and ahead of the curve.
-Ability to work collaboratively in a team environmentYou are adaptable, thrive in fast-paced environments and hungry to learn and be coached

What We Offer: 
-Ability to shape the exciting journey of AI and be part of the very early days of one of the hottest startup in AI A fun, young, multicultural team and collaborative work environment
-Competitive salary and bonus structure 
-Opportunities for professional growth and development

We are seeking an experienced Python backend developer to join our development team.

Your mission will be to:
- Architect and optimize the backend for a cloud-deployed platform that integrates our open-source solutions, empowering users to leverage our models in a variety of applications.
- Build robust, scalable backend systems that support the integration of Mistral AI models into a range of use scenarios, such as chatbots, search engines, document processing, and more.
- Implement developer-centric tools, including performance dashboards and evaluation interfaces to enhance product interaction and monitoring capabilities.

The ideal candidate should possess:
- Proven experience in Python, with a strong focus on backend development in Django and/or FastAPI.
- Expertise in database technologies such as Postgres or Redis, with a keen eye for optimizing data storage and retrieval operations.
- A strong understanding of infrastructure, continuous integration, and continuous development principles.
- Interest in applying backend development skills to AI-driven solutions, potentially involving large language models.
- The ability to independently craft top-tier solutions focused on backend systems while considering the overall user experience.
- Eagerness to quickly adapt to emerging technologies within a dynamic development landscape.
- The desire to gain insights into AI software intricacies and contribute to the team with their backend development expertise.

The ideal candidate will play a pivotal role within our AI engineering team, collaborating closely with the team lead to drive the development and implementation of innovative products. You will contribute your backend expertise to shape the future of AI-powered applications, working alongside a dynamic team to turn vision into reality.

We value strong candidates with verifiable accomplishments.

Compensation: Salary starts at 80,000€ and is commensurate with experience.

Join our team and contribute to the cutting-edge of AI application development with your backend expertise!

company_name: Mistral AI - Data Scientist - Product Insights
description:
We are seeking a skilled and motivated Data Scientist to join our growing team at Mistral AI. 
The ideal candidate will have a strong background in machine learning, data analysis, and statistical modeling, with a proven track record of delivering high-quality results in a fast-paced environment. 
As a Data Scientist, you will work closely with our interdisciplinary team of engineers, researchers, and product managers on the following:

- Build or implement the relevant tools to improve our understanding of our users and usage of our services 
- Develop and apply machine learning algorithms, statistical models, and data mining techniques to extract valuable insights from large and complex datasets.
- Design and implement end-to-end data science projects, from data collection and preprocessing to model building, evaluation, and deployment.
- Analyze the usage of our products (including lechat) in order to improve them based on observed usage
- Build cohort analysis to understand user behaviors and answer some key questions related to usage; churn,..
- Study causal association between usage & retention rate and Identify features that lead to increase retention of our users 
- Conduct in-depth analysis of complex data sets to identify trends, patterns, and anomalies  
- Design and implemented data quality controls to ensure accuracy and integrity of data  
- Communicate findings and recommendations to stakeholders in clear and concise reports and presentations  
- Develop data-driven insights to identify opportunities to improve the product or build new products
- Propose, design, and analyze large scale online experiments
- Work collaboratively with cross-functional partners identify opportunities for largest business impact

Who are you...
- Self-started; start-up mindset 
- Autonomous 
- Highly technical but with a strong product acumen
- Strong problem-solving and critical thinking skills, with a proven ability to work independently and as part of a team.
- Minimum 3 years of industry experience as a Data Scientist or equivalent.
- Experience in experimental design and analysis, exploratory data analysis and statistical analysis.
- Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R
- Proficiency in SQL.
- Master's or Ph.D. degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Engineering, or a related field.
- Strong knowledge of statistical analysis, machine learning algorithms, and data mining techniques.
- Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to explain complex technical concepts to non-technical audiences.
- Experience working with large and complex datasets, including data preprocessing, cleaning, and transformation.

We are seeking our first DevOps Engineer.

Responsibilities
- Collaborate with AI/ML engineers and researchers to develop and implement a CI/CD that enables safe and reproducible experiments
- Enable seamless replication of work environment across several HPC clusters 
- Implement and maintain monitoring, logging and alerting systems for both our large training runs and our client-facing APIs
- Make sure training environments are always available and ready on several clusters
- Improve development processes while finding the right balance between rigor, speed and flexibility for software development & research organization
- Develop and own internal tooling
- Collaborate with our AI/ML engineers and data scientists to build and maintain a secure, scalable, and efficient infrastructure.
- Develop and implement CI/CD pipelines to streamline the evaluation and development of AI/ML models and other applications.
- Ensure compliance with security best practices and industry standards.
- Work closely with the development team to troubleshoot and resolve issues in production environments.
- Develop and maintain containerization and orchestration systems using tools like Docker and Kubernetes.
- Document processes and procedures to ensure consistency and knowledge sharing across the team

About you: 
- Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent experience.
- 3+ years of experience in a DevOps role, preferably in an AI/ML-focused environment.
- Strong experience with Kubernetes-based cloud computing
- Proficiency in scripting languages such as Python, Bash, or PowerShell.
- Experience with CI/CD tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI, or CircleCI.
- Experience with containerization and orchestration technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes.
- Strong knowledge of Python development good practices
- Having worked with GPUs before is a + but not required
- Familiarity with infrastructure-as-code tools like Terraform or CloudFormation.
- Knowledge of monitoring, logging, and alerting tools like Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack, or Datadog.
- You ideally have an experience in Slurm
- Strong understanding of networking, security, and system administration concepts.
- Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
- Self-motivated and able to work well in a fast-paced startup environment.

What We Offer: 
- Ability to shape the exciting journey of AI and be part of the very early days of one of Europe’s hottest startup 
- A fun, young, multicultural team and collaborative work environment — based in Paris and London 
- Competitive salary and bonus structure 
- Comprehensive benefits package 
- Opportunities for professional growth and development

We are hiring a full-stack developer for the following mission:

- Develop user-facing internal and external applications using Mistral AI models for the various purposes enabled by LLM (chatbot, search engines, document answering, …)
- Instrument Mistral AI products with developer-facing tools (e.g. dashboards, evaluation interfaces, …)

The successful candidate has:

- Excellent proficiency in full-stack development (Python/Typescript/Javascript)
- Strong ability to create the smoothest user experience autonomously, for both developer facing and end-user facing products
- Appetite and experience in front-end development, with mastery of one framework such as ReactJS, Svelte, Vue.js, HTMX, …
- Strong ability in back-end development and in the usage of cloud solutions
- Appetite for constructing AI-based solutions, based on e.g. chat APIs, embedding APIs, …

The successful candidate can adapt to new technologies very quickly, and can evolve in a quickly changing developing environment. They are willing to learn the specifics of AI software, and to make the team benefit from their front-end expertise.

The candidate will be fully integrated into the AI development team.

Strong references are needed – in particular, a portfolio of successful projects would be greatly appreciated.

Compensation: Salary starts at 80,000€ and is commensurate with experience.

Join our team and contribute to the cutting-edge of AI application development with your full-stack expertise!

We are hiring a full-stack developer for the following mission:

- Develop user-facing internal and external applications using Mistral AI models for the various purposes enabled by LLM (chatbot, search engines, document answering, …)
- Instrument Mistral AI products with developer-facing tools (e.g. dashboards, evaluation interfaces, …)

The successful candidate has:

- Excellent proficiency in full-stack development (Python/Typescript/Javascript)
- Strong ability to create the smoothest user experience autonomously, for both developer facing and end-user facing products
- Appetite and experience in front-end development, with mastery of one framework such as ReactJS, Svelte, Vue.js, HTMX, …
- Strong ability in back-end development and in the usage of cloud solutions
- Appetite for constructing AI-based solutions, based on e.g. chat APIs, embedding APIs, …

The successful candidate can adapt to new technologies very quickly, and can evolve in a quickly changing developing environment. They are willing to learn the specifics of AI software, and to make the team benefit from their front-end expertise.

The candidate will be fully integrated into the AI development team.

Strong references are needed – in particular, a portfolio of successful projects would be greatly appreciated.

Compensation: Salary starts at 80,000€ and is commensurate with experience.

Join our team and contribute to the cutting-edge of AI application development with your full-stack expertise!

We are seeking an experienced backend engineer to join our development team.

Your mission will be to:

Pre-Sale & Sales Activities:
- Conduct pre-sale calls to understand potential clients' needs, challenges, and aspirations.
- Lead qualification calls to pinpoint prospects who would gain the most from our solutions.
- Collaborate with the sales team to advance the sales pipeline, providing technical expertise and insights where necessary.

Product Implementation & Integration:
- Guide and support customers in deploying our AI models and products into their infrastructure.
- Work closely with customers to help them fine-tune models according to their specific requirements.
- Assist clients in integrating our APIs into their front-end interfaces, ensuring a smooth user experience.
- Regularly liaise with the product and technical teams to relay feedback and suggest improvements.
- Design and develop product features that would meet the needs of many customers.

Customer Success & Support:
- Continually ensure that the customer is maximising the product's potential.
- Provide post-deployment support, addressing any issues or challenges that arise promptly.
- Conduct periodic reviews with customers to ascertain their satisfaction and gather feedback.
- Offer recommendations for product optimisations or new features based on customer feedback.
- Develop these features if needed.

Required Skills & Qualifications:
- PhD / master in AI / data science.
- Strong coding skills with proficiency in Python
- Broad understanding of software engineering principles and infrastructure
- Passion for AI, with a constant drive to stay updated and ahead of the curve.
- Proven experience in product implementation in AI or machine learning products.
- Strong communication skills with an ability to explain complex technical concepts in simple terms.
- Demonstrated ability to manage projects and lead them to successful completion.
- Proficient in understanding and developing code.
- Familiarity with front-end interfaces and integration processes.
- Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.

About The Job
You’ll partner with our tech & business hiring managers to find world-changing talent for Mistral
You'll be charged with finding unique candidates who bring an entrepreneurial spirit, strong commitment and passion for success 
You will be responsible for guiding candidates through our hiring process and introducing them to the magic of working at Mistral 
An early joiner of Mistral, you will contribute to shaping the recruitment process and our TA machinery. 

Responsibilities
Deeply understand hiring needs, partner closely with hiring managers and stakeholders to develop sourcing and hiring strategies.
Successfully fulfill the Tech, Science and business team's recruiting needs Identify, attract, and ensure high-touch candidate experience to continuously deliver high-quality candidates and meet hiring goals.
Act as the employer branding champions to cultivate hiring managers and interviewers to represent the company's culture in a meaningful wayUse data to create a narrative around hiring, diversity & inclusion, candidate experience, and team communication & collaboration.
Dive deep into data and root cause issues.
Proactively identify and solve problems.
Manage full-cycle recruiting process ensuring a smooth and bespoke candidate experience.
Help improve our process, documentation, tooling and talent market intelligence.
Identify candidate closing strategies and proactively coach and inform candidates through the entire recruiting process.
Develop and own search strategies and deliver research against those strategies for searches across various business & technical functions (GTM; Partnership, Sales, Research Scientist; Engineer) Build relationships for the future with passive candidates and talent.
Contribute to continuous improvement and innovation in the efficiency and effectiveness of our systems, services, and processes.

About you : 
A self-starter who is result-oriented, resourceful, innovative, intellectually curious, and who takes initiative and risks.
4+ years of experience in research at an executive search or recruiting experience within a corporate environment.
No ego and highly committed to deliver. 
Able and keen to to jump from strategic topics to very hands-on workIdeally, you have a track record of recruiting both in business & tech roles
Experience in complex recruiting  and autonomous hiring in outbound contextsExperience working to recruit in highly competitive talent markets 
Open learning mindset and fast learner, demonstrated capacity to quickly grasp new complex subject matter, and understanding of new markets, areas, roles, and business initiatives.
Capability, credibility, and consultative skills to influence senior colleagues and stakeholders without authority.
Professional brand of personal accountability, drive, work ethics 
Fluent in english 
Experience recruiting internationally 
Ideally, proficiency with Lever, LinkedIn Recruiter, and GoodTimeStrong written and verbal communication
Comfortable working within the ambiguity of a small, growing startup with a strong desire to turn that ambiguity into a well-defined machine.
Target driven, detail oriented and approachable with the ability to prioritize and work well in an environment with competing demands.

Role Summary:
As our Head of Product Marketing, you will play a pivotal role in bringing our cutting-edge large language models and platform to market. Your unique skill set will blend technical understanding with the ability to communicate benefits and features to technical and business-focused audiences. You will need to shape the value proposition of going from our open models to our enterprise-generative AI solutions while fostering brand adoption from the bottom up (through developers) and from the top (through executive decision-makers).

Key Responsibilities:

Product Messaging & Content Creation:
Develop compelling content that effectively communicates our solutions' value proposition and technical advantages. Examples include
website content, materials targeted toward developers and targeted toward key decision makes.
Craft insightful and persuasive presentation slides tailored for diverse audiences (incl. press & media)
Design and maintain a robust 'battle card' to equip sales and technical teams with essential information, responses, and tactics for potential customer inquiries.

Customer Understanding & Market Intelligence:
Create deep understanding of customers’ needs and pain points fast (through customer research, creating detailed buyer and buyer personas, etc.) and use the generated insight to guide product development and marketing strategies
Research and stay updated on industry trends, competitor products, and emerging technologies.
Collaborate with the product team to ensure marketing strategies align with product enhancements and launches.

Stakeholder Collaboration:
Work closely with sales, technical, and product teams to ensure consistent messaging and positioning across all channels.
Support the training of internal teams on the product's unique selling points, advantages, and potential applications.

Feedback Loop:
Collect and analyse customer, partner, and market feedback to inform product improvements and marketing strategies.

Event Strategy & Preparation:
Lay out our event strategy around industry events, webinars, and conferences, representing the brand and product.
Prepare materials and content for event participation.

Required Qualifications:
10+ years of experience in product marketing in the tech or software industry -- AI expertise is a plus
Exceptional ability to create and articulate value propositions, messaging, and product and brand positioning across all relevant stakeholders and to package these as compelling stories that engage target audiences
Strong written and verbal communication skills in English (native) and, ideally, other European languages
Familiarity with cloud computing concepts, LLMs and AI products
Experience with content creation tools and platforms

Preferred Qualifications:
Experience marketing open-source products or b2b SaaS products
Eye for beauty and very appealing designs
Understanding of machine learning, specifically generative models
Demonstrated ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams

What We Offer:
Ability to shape the exciting journey of AI and be part of the very early days of one of Europe’s hottest startup
A fun, young, multicultural team and collaborative work environment — based in Paris and London
Competitive salary and bonus structure
Comprehensive benefits package
Opportunities for professional growth and development

You would be our first design hire for the Mistral AI team. The role is responsible for designing our product experiences from brainstorming to deployment: la Plateforme and le Chat. The role would also be responsible for Communications Design, including our website and external storytelling.
As a Product Designer at Mistral AI, you will play a crucial role in deploying our advanced AI systems by creating intuitive and human-centric products as well as supporting our Communications Design to share our story with the world. Together, we strive to make a meaningful impact and push the boundaries of what is possible with AI.

What you will do:

- Formulate and drive the design vision, be an active participant in exploration, ideation, and experimentation to realize it. Ability to independently initiate and execute product innovations from inception to implementation.
- Engage in communication, adept at storytelling through written, visual, and verbal mediums. Effectively convey ideas and concepts to various stakeholders.
- Cultivate a deep understanding of our developers, fostering a product-centric mindset. Translate insights into actionable opportunities for product enhancement.
- Foster strong relationships and collaborate closely with our product team and engineers throughout the product development lifecycle. From problem identification to solution delivery, actively contribute to cross-functional efforts.
- Promote design comprehension and sensibility across the organization, refining work methodologies and design processes to enhance efficiency and effectiveness.
- Ensure UI consistency aligned with Mistral’s brand identity, making deliberate design choices and upholding a standard of excellence in product delivery.
- Contribute to the development of the design system, including comprehensive component documentation.

About you

- A self-starter who is results-oriented, resourceful, innovative, intellectually curious, and who takes initiative and risks.
- 4+ years of experience in Product Design including in all or some of the following: UX design, UI design, project management, 0-to-1 products, front-end development, product marketing, and Communications Design.
- No ego and highly committed to deliver.
- Fluent in English.
- Highly collaborative and able to balance multiple projects and stakeholders.
- Professional behavior with personal accountability, drive, and work ethics.
- Target driven, detail oriented and approachable with the ability to prioritize and work well in an environment with competing demands.

About the Team & our design organization 

At Mistral AI, we are a tight-knit, nimble team dedicated to bringing our cutting-edge AI technology to the world. Our mission is to make AI ubiquitous and open. 
Our team values are reflected in our design values:

- Cool: We have a tongue-in-cheek way of looking at things, it’s hard to describe but you know it when you see it.
- Precision: Our designs mirror the rigor and excellence that underpin our technology, reflecting our commitment to quality and reliability.
- Human-Centric: We strive to make our technology open, approachable, and accessible.
- Captivating: Our designs reflect the magic of our technology and our playful, exploratory approach to innovation.
- Ambitious: We push the boundaries of what is possible, reflecting our bold vision for the future.

Mistral AI is looking for an Solution Architect to drive adoption of its products with its early customers.

The Solution Architect will be an integral part of our team, dedicated to driving the successful deployment of Mistral AI products within our customer's infrastructure. They will work hand-in-hand with customers from the pre-sale stage to post-implementation, ensuring our solutions not only meet but exceed client expectations.

They will participate in designing Mistral AI products so that they meet many customers needs. This is a critical role for Mistral AI to propose the smoothest experience with generative AI to its customers.

The Solution Architect will not be deployed on Mistral AI customer premises, but will follow closely their process of integration from Mistral AI offices. They will work very closely with the product team to design and implement new features.

Key Responsibilities:

Pre-Sale & Sales Activities:
Conduct pre-sale calls to understand potential clients' needs, challenges, and aspirations.
Lead qualification calls to pinpoint prospects who would gain the most from our solutions.
Collaborate with the sales team to advance the sale pipeline, providing technical expertise and insights where necessary.

Product Implementation & Integration:
Guide and support customers in deploying our text completion API into their infrastructure.
Work closely with customers to fine-tune models according to their specific requirements.
Assist clients in integrating our APIs into their front-end interfaces, ensuring a smooth user experience.
Regularly liaise with the product and technical teams to relay feedback and suggest improvements.
Design and develop product features that would meet the need of many customers.

Customer Success & Support:
Continually ensure that the customer is maximising the product's potential.
Provide post-deployment support, addressing any issues or challenges that arise promptly.
Conduct periodic reviews with customers to ascertain their satisfaction and gather feedback.
Offer recommendations for product optimisations or new features based on customer feedback.
Develop these features if needed.

Required Skills & Qualifications:
PhD / master in AI / data science.
Passion for AI, with a constant drive to stay updated and ahead of the curve.
Proven experience in product implementation in AI or machine learning products.
Strong communication skills with an ability to explain complex technical concepts in simple terms.

Mistral AI is looking for an Solution Architect to drive adoption of its products with its early customers.

The Solution Architect will be an integral part of our team, dedicated to driving the successful deployment of Mistral AI products within our customer's infrastructure. They will work hand-in-hand with customers from the pre-sale stage to post-implementation, ensuring our solutions not only meet but exceed client expectations.

They will participate in designing Mistral AI products so that they meet many customers needs. This is a critical role for Mistral AI to propose the smoothest experience with generative AI to its customers.

The Solution Architect will not be deployed on Mistral AI customer premises, but will follow closely their process of integration from Mistral AI offices. They will work very closely with the product team to design and implement new features.

Key Responsibilities:

Pre-Sale & Sales Activities:
Conduct pre-sale calls to understand potential clients' needs, challenges, and aspirations.
Lead qualification calls to pinpoint prospects who would gain the most from our solutions.
Collaborate with the sales team to advance the sale pipeline, providing technical expertise and insights where necessary.

Product Implementation & Integration:
Guide and support customers in deploying our text completion API into their infrastructure.
Work closely with customers to fine-tune models according to their specific requirements.
Assist clients in integrating our APIs into their front-end interfaces, ensuring a smooth user experience.
Regularly liaise with the product and technical teams to relay feedback and suggest improvements.
Design and develop product features that would meet the need of many customers.

Customer Success & Support:
Continually ensure that the customer is maximising the product's potential.
Provide post-deployment support, addressing any issues or challenges that arise promptly.
Conduct periodic reviews with customers to ascertain their satisfaction and gather feedback.
Offer recommendations for product optimisations or new features based on customer feedback.
Develop these features if needed.

Required Skills & Qualifications:
PhD / master in AI / data science.
Passion for AI, with a constant drive to stay updated and ahead of the curve.
Proven experience in product implementation in AI or machine learning products.
Strong communication skills with an ability to explain complex technical concepts in simple terms.
Demonstrated ability to manage projects and lead them to successful completion.
Proficient in understanding and developing code.
Familiarity with front-end interfaces and integration processes.
Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.

Mistral AI is hiring an expert in the role of pre-training and fine-tuning large language models.

The role will involve
- modifying pre-trained large language models to make them able to interact with humans
- equipping large language models with the ability of calling external tools
- aligning large language models based on feedback obtained during their deployment, or going through an ad-hoc annotation process.
- designing ad-hoc annotation processes themselves.
 
The role will also involve participating to the pre-training effort.

The successful candidate will have

- high scientific understanding of the field of generative AI. This means a broad knowledge of the field of AI, and specific knowledge or interest in fine-tuning and using language models for applications.

- high technical engineering competence. This means being able to design complex software and make them usable in production. She is able to navigate the full MLOps technical stack, with a focus on architecture development and model evaluation and usage. She will occasionally be able to do front-end development, and have to use complex HPC infrastructure with full autonomy.

company_name: Mistral AI - Data Annotation Technical Program Manager
description:
About Mistral AI

We're a small team, composed of seasoned researchers and engineers in the AI field. We like to work hard and be at the edge of science. We are creative, low-ego, team-spirited, and have been passionate about AI for years. We hire people that foster in competitive environments, because they find them more fun to work in. 
Developers are using our API via la Plateforme to build incredible AI-first applications powered by our models that can understand and generate natural language text and code. We are multilingual at our core. More recently, we released le Chat, as a demonstrator of our models.

The Role

You would be our first Data hire for the Mistral AI team. The role is focused on accelerating the pace of research at Mistral AI. You would be responsible for managing our Data Annotation & Collection process from brainstorming to application. 
This role is a critical feature between our research roadmap, Annotators, and the engineering team to build an annotation platform for all data efforts. As a Data Manager at Mistral AI, you will play a crucial role in creating our advanced AI systems by leveraging intuitive and human-centric products. Together, we strive to make a meaningful impact and push the boundaries of what is possible with AI.

What you will do

Collaborate with adjacent researchers to define project requirements, including timeline, budget, and success metrics. Oversee data collection campaigns by

- Liaising with researchers to understand project needs
- Designing campaign onboarding processes and maintaining relevant documentation
- Reporting on quality, throughput, spend, and insightful trends to cross-functional teams
- Enable Science and Product teams to seamlessly leverage data by building frameworks, tools, and processes to analyze data using SQL, Python, or other technical means

Ensure data collection campaign quality and success while scaling impact through collaboration with vendors and internal Operations Specialists. Contribute to team systems by

- Managing a team of data annotators
- Implementing and managing a quality control system
- Designing overall training and onboarding strategies and materials for vendors
- Developing dashboards, command centers, and queries to monitor progress in quality, throughput, and spend
- Collaborating with engineers to track and implement feature requests and troubleshoot issues
- Utilize Mistral AI’s product and research capabilities to enhance data collection efficiency and maintain a competitive edge.

Who are you ...

This role provides the execution, experience, and rigor to successfully design, kick-off, orchestrate, and own the outcomes of each data collection campaign. You might thrive in this role if you:


- Are autonomous, scrapy, you have a start-up mindset and know how to navigate ambiguity
- Possess experience in creating or managing data labeling operations.
- Love looking at data and know how to make your life easier while doing it
- Act as a strategic collaborator for Mistral AI's researchers, offering guidance on achieving their objectives.
- Leverage both technical and non-technical expertise to excel in the role.
- Communicate effectively, proactively addressing the needs of vendors and partners.
- Embrace hands-on problem-solving and creativity on a daily basis.
- Design scalable processes, recognizing that implementation is only the first step in driving change.
- Demonstrate an action-oriented and inquisitive mindset, often resulting in proficiency with software and tools.
- As a bonus, possess coding skills to debug or contribute to Mistral AI's annotation platform when appropriate, although this is not a primary focus of the role.

About the Team & our design organization

At Mistral AI, we are a tight-knit, nimble team dedicated to bringing our cutting-edge AI technology to the world. Our mission is to make AI ubiquitous and open.

Mistral AI is hiring an expert in the role of serving and training large language models at high speed on GPUs. The role can be based in Paris, London, or in San Francisco.

The role will involve
-Writing low-level code to take all advantage of high-end GPUs (H100) and max out their capacity-Rethinking various part of the generative model architecture to make them more suitable for efficient inference
-Integrating low-level efficient code in a high-level MLOps framework 

The successful candidate will have
-High technical competence for writing custom CUDA kernels and pushing GPUs to their limits. High expertise on the distributed computation infrastructure of current generation GPU clusters
-Overall understanding of the field of generative AI, knowledge or interest in fine-tuning and using language models for applications
